localize.text: Did you hear the news manager?
They found rodents in one of the restricted areas.
This could be a serious issue.
The rodents themselves are not much of a problem. However their feces, and the cables they have gnawed on may damage the system.
This is one of the reasons why security is important.
I will personally deal with the rodents this time.
If you find any rodents, please notify me immediately.
